name: Jille Bartolome
company: Business Coaching, Coach Certification, Group Coaching, Life Coaching Certification, Podcast Host
what_you_do: Guides professional women to build unshakeable confidence to create the life and business can't wait to show up for
social_proof: MCC – Master Certified Coach through the International Coach Federation since 2006, Founder and Training Director at CoachPath Academy, Faculty Mentor at the University of Texas, Dallas, Executive Coaching Program since 2018, Former Faculty Member at Coach University from 2004 - 2024, Former Faculty Member at ADDCA (A.D.D. Coach Academy) from 2011 – 2018, Founding Officer of A Hand Up Coaching non-profit in 2001, ICF Credentialing Assessor for ACC, PCC and MCC - 2018 to Present, ICF Accreditation Assessor for Level 1 and Level 2 Programs - 2021 - Present, Subject Matter Expert for the ICF Executive Committee on Assessment tools for Level 1 and Level 2 candidates, Subject Matter Expert for the ICF Coaching Book of Knowledge. 2024 - 2025
business_focus: Guides professional women to build unshakeable confidence to create the life and business can't wait to show up for
